full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA RGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA DE NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI BA ZHES, AER TE NI DZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR, SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA LHAG CHAD SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZE BA'I, BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DBEN BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU LAM BZANG GI RKYEN NGAN BAR DO KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,'GO BA THAMS CAD LA DGE BAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,SHUBHAm LEGS DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
